long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Grid's Chrome Extension for B2B Sales providing Company Intelligence and Business Contact information *** for Free

🌐 Access Hyper-Localized Data On Any Website
Use our Chrome Extension to tap into The Grid's industry-leading B2B contact and company data on any website

🔑 Unlock Key Information Instantly
Retrieve company information and access emails of key decision-makers directly from any website.


👊 For Sales Professionals
🚀 Effortless Data Retrieval
Powered by The Grid’s premier B2B intelligence platform, retrieve company phone numbers, email addresses, and key buying signals without leaving your current tab.
🔍 Identify Leads Easily
Find leads on LinkedIn or company websites and seamlessly send prospects an email or add them to an automated sequence—all within The Grid’s Chrome Extension.
📊 Simplify Data Management
Say goodbye to manual data entry. Export your searches to Salesforce (coming soon), HubSpot (coming soon), or in CSV format.


👋 For Recruiters
📱 Supercharge Your Sourcing
Access direct contact information for millions of candidates without leaving LinkedIn, Indeed, or company websites.
✅ Streamline Candidate Management
Add qualified candidates to an automated email sequence or a project using our Lead Engagement module. Manage your search by applying tags to candidates or companies.
🖱 One-Click Shortlist
Shotlist and export candidates from The Grid’s best-in-class data solution.


💘 Customer Testimonials
“Before The Grid, it took our team a full day each week to curate leads. Now, it takes just 1 hour, saving us over 300 hours per sales rep annually. We regularly hit our challenging monthly targets.” – Xero

“The Grid saves us so much time generating target lists of prospects that fit our ideal customer profile and getting contact details, allowing my team to focus more on sales outreach.” – Aspire
“In the past, we relied on personal contacts or previous sponsors. Now, thanks to The Grid, we are securing new sponsors from various industries like hospitality, fashion, entertainment, and consumer electronics by finding key stakeholders in HR and marketing.” – Cerebral Palsy Alliance Singapore - CPAS
